name: EAG Life Sciences (formerly Cyanta)
tag_list: analytical-services, method-development, extractables-and-leachables, impurity-identification, stability-services, method-validation, medical-device-testing, bioanalytical-services, custom-synthesis
overview:
Cyanta Analytical Services provides comprehensive analytical, custom synthesis and bioanalytical development services for the pharmaceutical, biotech and medical device industry.

Our analytical services support early to late phase projects. Services include method development and validation, extractables and leachables studies, reference standard characterization, impurity or contaminant identification, stability services and storage and non- routine investigations. Cyantaâ€™s bioanalytical services include method development/validation, biomarker assay development, dose formulation and PK/PD/TK analysis. Additionally, Cyanta offers custom synthesis and medicinal chemistry support.

Cyantaâ€™s 20,000 sq.ft. facility is centrally located in a suburb of St. Louis, MO
